CustomField.description: Field used for VVS (Vista Value Selling) for Closing Plan
CustomField.formula:
((value(LEFT( text( Catalyst_Key_Influencer_Engagement__c ) , 1))*1) + (value(LEFT( text(Competitive_Differentiation__c ) , 1))*1) + (value(LEFT( text( Cost_of_Inaction__c ) , 1))*1.5) + (value(LEFT( text( Decision_Maker_Engagement__c ) , 1))*1.5) + (value(LEFT( text( Demo_Quality__c ) , 1))* 1) + (value(LEFT( text( Funding__c ) , 1))*1) + (value(LEFT( text( Influencer_Engagement__c ) , 1))*1) + (value(LEFT( text( Key_Threats__c ) , 1))*1) + (value(LEFT( text( Objectives_Success_Measures__c ) , 1))*1.5) + (value(LEFT( text( Our_Proof__c ) , 1))*1) + (value(LEFT( text( Process_Understanding_Alignment__c ) , 1))*1.5) + (value(LEFT( text( Purchase_Requirements__c ) , 1))*1.5) + (value(LEFT( text( ROI_VVS__c ) , 1))*1.5) + (value(LEFT( text( Urgency__c ) , 1))*1))
/(17*3)
CustomField.label: Quantitative Deal Strength Score (%)
